title: Can you buy anything from money? - Quora

response.answer_text: You can buy anything in this world with right amount of money in your hand. There isn’t anything that that piece of paper can’t buy it for you. People say that you can’t buy intelligence from it but you can buy an intelligent person for you to do your work.They say you can’t buy happiness in life with money never saw a person sad while riding a Porsche,never saw a person sad on his private yacht,never saw a person sad on world tour.They say you can’t buy love with money ever heard of sites and companies who will help you get the most suitable match for you at the right price.They say you can’t buy friends with money there will stick plenty of friends and so called well wishers around you who would love to be called your friend and would love to experience your rich life.You can be a hero if that’s what you want look at Batman.The only power the guy has got is the power of money.You wanna do good and get your statues be in the city center in your memory all you need is money donate some of that.You can buy your life with money,never heard of a rich person dying cause he/she couldn’t afford a treatment.They say you can’t impress a person be it a girl or guy with money,wait for a while you show them your lifestyle the things you could do with money maybe a weekend tour on your private jet and then see how their perspective change.You wanna buy a piece of moon or hell you wanna go to moon all this could be done with money.You dream about your thing and your money will definitely do it for you. You can consider money as an animal with traits of a dog and a cat,it will be the cutest and loyalest thing you can have and at the same time wouldn’t care and live you at your darkest.
Interesting Question, you can not Buy Childhood, School and College Time, Good moments and Happiness from Money, Money is something but not everything.

The point is, you can never buy anything and everything with money. You can definitely pay the price of materialistic things; but emotions, feelings, attachments, knowledge and more develop as time passes. They cannot be brought. They are not even sold.
No, we can’t better you can fire it, straight away, if you have any.
